Sentencas: Dense, nanocrystalline gadolinia doped ceria (CGO) thin films were prepared by sputtering on a variety of substrates.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: The CGO films were electrochemically characterized with the aid of interdigitated Pt electrodes by impedance spectroscopy as a function of operating temperature (175 - 340 degrees C) CGO film thickness (157, 233, 315 nm), deposition temperature (room temperature, 300, 500 degrees C), and Pt electrode pattern geometry (line pattern spacing 10, 15, 25, 50, 100 pm).
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: The different parameter variations enabled the identification of five contributions to the impedance spectra attributed, respectively, to wiring and contacts, grain, grain boundary, current constriction at the triple phase boundary, and electrode effects.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the CGO films were characterized by the expression sigma=(A/T)exp( - E-A/kT), with A=10(8.66 +/- 0.72)
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: Scm(-1)K and EA=0.97 +/- 0.07 eV with magnitude higher than values reported for both bulk and thin film CGO previously reported in the literature.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: The electrochemical impedance of the Pt electrodes was found to decrease markedly for CGO films grown at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures

Sentencas: Explanations for these observations are presented.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical characterization of planar Pt-CGO microstructures
